outputs.output_descr: The Fiji National Biodiversity Strategy Action Plan (Fiji NBSAP) Add-on project will assess the capacity building needs of Fiji to implement and update the NBSAP and fulfill its commitment to the UN Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD). Specifically the scope of this request will be a country driven project to establish and utilize a national Clearing House Mechanism (CHM) to further disseminate and share biodiversity information.

project_descr: The project enables the design of effective response measures to improve Fiji's efforts in conserving biological diversity at national, sub-national and community levels.
project_title: FIJI National Biodiversity Strategy & Action Plan
